welcome.title: Welcome to DevStack Manager
welcome.description: This wizard will guide you through the installation of DevStack Manager on your computer.
welcome.app_description:
DevStack Manager is a comprehensive development environment management tool that helps you install, configure, and manage various development tools and services.

Click 'Next' to continue with the installation.

installation_path.title: Choose Installation Location
installation_path.description: Choose the folder where DevStack Manager will be installed.
installation_path.label: Destination Folder:
installation_path.info: üí° DevStack Manager will be installed in this folder along with all its components and configurations.

components.title: Select Additional Options
components.description: Choose additional options for your DevStack Manager installation.
components.label: Additional Options:
components.path_info: ‚ö†Ô∏è Adding to PATH allows you to use DevStack commands directly from the terminal anywhere.

ready_to_install.title: Ready to Install
ready_to_install.description: The wizard is ready to begin installation. Review your settings below.

installing.title: Installing DevStack Manager
installing.description: Please wait while DevStack Manager is being installed...

finished.title: Installation Complete
finished.description: DevStack Manager has been successfully installed on your computer.
finished.success_message: DevStack Manager has been successfully installed. You can now use the application to manage your development environment.

dialogs.cancel_message: Are you sure you want to cancel the installation?
